screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .selectionportfoliolibrary file in Corel Painter 2023
screenshot.caption: SELECTIONPORTFOLIOLIBRARY file open in Corel Painter 2023

description: Painter offers various features for illustrating artwork and modifying photographs. Saved path-based selections saved in SELECTIONPORTFOLIOLIBRARY files provide a quick way to insert a shape into a Painter file. Default selections include a circle, rounded square, globe, star, and spiral.
You can add or remove a library of selections through the Media Library panel. To open this feature, select Window → Media Panels → Selections and click the "Selection Portfolio" tab.
